attributes.action: Reconsider the plans to give DEAs the right to enter every home in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every householder should object to this bill which will give inspectors a legal right to enter your home and inspect every room. These people will not  be investigated to see if they have a criminal record and we will be legally obliged to admit them into our homes. This is nothing short of a BURGLARS CHARTER and must be stopped.
